org.apache.james.transport.mailets

Class RecipientRewriteTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mailet.base.GenericMailet
      • org.apache.james.transport.mailets.AbstractRecipientRewriteTableMailet
        • org.apache.james.transport.mailets.RecipientRewriteTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.mailet.Mailet, org.apache.mailet.MailetConfig

    public class RecipientRewriteTable
extends AbstractRecipientRewriteTableMailet
    Mailet which should get used when using RecipientRewriteTable-Store to implementations for mappings of forwards and aliases.
